title: Marketing Project Coordinator
job_overview:
Job Title: Marketing Project Coordinator
Work Setup: Remote / Full-Time (40 hours per week)
Monthly Salary: Starting at Php 50,000 (based on experience)
Department: Marketing
Reports To: Director of Marketing

About the Role
We’re looking for a detail-oriented Marketing Project Coordinator to help manage and streamline our marketing campaigns and initiatives. You’ll be the key person making sure tasks stay on track, deadlines are met, and projects are executed smoothly across teams. If you’re highly organized, proactive, and love collaborating with others—this could be the perfect opportunity for you.

Responsibilities
Manage timelines and workflows for marketing campaigns and product launches

Coordinate with Brand, Acquisition, Retention, Creative, and external teams to keep tasks aligned and moving

Create and update project trackers using tools like Asana, ClickUp, or similar

Lead project check-ins and help prioritize key deliverables

Monitor progress, manage dependencies, and flag risks or delays

Ensure creative assets (emails, ads, landing pages, influencer content) are delivered and approved on time

Track campaign performance with Analytics and help report key KPIs

Provide post-campaign recaps with results and suggestions for improvement

Requirements
2–4 years of project coordination experience (preferably in ecommerce, DTC, or agency environments)

Strong organizational skills and attention to detail

Excellent communicator who works well with cross-functional teams

Comfortable managing multiple deadlines and stakeholders

Familiarity with digital marketing campaigns and creative workflows

Proficient in project management tools (Asana, Trello, Upgrade to see actual info, ClickUp, etc.)

Creative, analytical, and results-driven mindset

Stable internet connection and dedicated home workspace

Application Questions
Are you comfortable using Teramind (remote productivity monitoring tool)?

Are you available to work full-time (40 hours/week) as an independent contractor?

Work Location: Remote (Philippines-based applicants only)
Schedule: 8-hour shift (Philippine Time Zone)
